criterion: Provides information about the importance of regular appointments for diabetes management
Incorrectly states that a closed-loop system is available for type 1 diabetes
Correctly explains the importance of monitoring blood sugar levels and adjusting insulin doses
Fails to mention the role of a registered dietitian in diabetes management
Clearly explains the difference between type 1 and type 2 diabetes
Incorrectly states that a person with type 1 diabetes can manage their condition without insulin
Correctly advises seeking medical attention if a person with type 1 diabetes experiences symptoms of hypoglycemia
Fails to mention the importance of carbohydrate counting for insulin dosing
Correctly explains the concept of ketones and their role in diabetic ketoacidosis
Incorrectly states that a person with type 1 diabetes can eat whatever they want without adjusting their insulin doses
Clearly explains the importance of physical activity for people with type 1 diabetes
